mapper.select: SELECT s.stuid, s.stuname, s.sex, s.school, s.natives, sc.html, sc.oracle, sc.js, sc.java, sc.superjava, sc.l1, sc.apprascore, dea.score0, dea.score1, dea.score2, dea.score3 FROM student s LEFT JOIN score sc ON sc.stuid = s.stuid LEFT JOIN dept_evaluation_all dea ON s.stuid = dea.stuid LEFT JOIN dept d ON d.deptid = s.deptno WHERE s.stuname like concat('%',#{stuname},'%') AND dea.dept_appraid = #{deptAppraid} AND sc.apprascore is NOT NULL AND sc.apprascore !=0
SELECT d.dname FROM dept d LEFT JOIN dept_appra da ON d.deptid = da.deptid WHERE dept_appraid = #{deptAppraid}

SELECT s.stuid, s.stuname, s.sex, s.school, s.natives, sc.html, sc.oracle, sc.js, sc.java, sc.superjava, sc.l1, sc.apprascore, dea.score0, dea.score1, dea.score2, dea.score3 FROM student s LEFT JOIN score sc ON sc.stuid = s.stuid LEFT JOIN dept_evaluation_all dea ON s.stuid = dea.stuid LEFT JOIN dept d ON d.deptid = s.deptno WHERE stuname like concat('%',#{stuname},'%') AND dea.dept_appraid = #{deptAppraid} AND score1 is NOT NULL AND score0 is NOT NULL AND score2 is NOT NULL AND score3 is NOT NULL AND score3 !=0 AND sc.apprascore is NOT NULL AND sc.apprascore !=0

SELECT job, dname, dept_appra_name FROM student s LEFT JOIN job j ON j.jobid = s.jobid LEFT JOIN dept d ON d.deptid = s.deptno LEFT JOIN dept_appra da ON da.deptid = s.deptno WHERE s.stuid = #{stuid} AND da.dept_appraid = (SELECT dea.dept_appraid FROM dept_evaluation_all dea WHERE s.stuid = dea.stuid)

SELECT ability, activity, moral_quality, disposition, communication, score0, score1, score2, score3, estimatedfirst, estimatedtwo, estimatedone, estimatedthird FROM dept_evaluation_score de LEFT JOIN dept_evaluation_all da ON de.stuid = da.stuid WHERE de.stuid = #{stuid} AND de.dateid = #{dateid}
